title: Steam anyone?
body:
So what is the chances of seeing League of Legends on steam?

I mean, Lord Gaben would surely support this game.

replies.body:
Well, first of all, Steam has DotA2 as their lead MOBA/ARTS, probably the same reason to why no other games such as Smite has made it up to Steam yet.

Secondly, I doubt they will accept large games without having a "2" on their titles, if you get what I mean. Hohoho.
yeah cause valve doesn't own dota 2, which is another moba that league competes with for players and what not
lol imagine the dota 2 fanboys if this happened, omg riot so shit they had to beg dota 2 main platform to make moneyz tooo
